name: Gravity Slime Platformer
description:
This is a two week game I made when taking a class on unity. A bit rough around the  edges but I hope you enjoy anyway.

Gravity Slime! In which you play as a gelatinous cube who on the search for flowers. In order to do that however 
you must pick up power ups in the levels that allow you to gain the power to change your gravity (up and down in the first level
and then all four directions in the next). You must however avoid the spikes and flying death balls as they will send you back 
to the start!

WASD to move
arrow keys to toggle gravity
space to jump
